item.title: TST developers sold $30,000 worth of tokens this morning, following CZ's statement that the private key to create TST has been deleted.
item.description: On August 11th, according to GMGN data, the TST developer address sold tokens worth more than $30,000 11 hours ago. As of the time of writing, the TST market capitalization is temporarily reported at $23.51 million, with a 24-hour decrease of 3.95%. Previously, Binance founder CZ stated that the private key for the TST address had been deleted. The original text review is as follows:CZ wrote on February 6th of this year: "A somewhat awkward situation. A member of the BNB Chain team just informed me: 'We created a step-by-step operation video tutorial for listing the MEME coin on the four.meme platform. In this video, we took a token called TST as an example. When we released this tutorial video yesterday, at the 1:18 mark, a frame showed the token's name. Some KOLs from the Chinese community began trading and promoting this token, and now the token's market capitalization has reached $494,560.'This team member deleted the video upon becoming aware of the situation. But the internet

item.title: ListaDao Proposal LIP 021: One-time 20% Token Burn, Optimizing Tokenomics
item.description: August 11th. ListaDao recently put forward LIP 021. It plans to permanently burn 20% of the maximum token supply of the LISTA token (approximately 200 million tokens), reducing the maximum supply from 1 billion to 800 million to achieve a more powerful deflationary effect and enhance the stability of token value.At the same time, the proposal suggests canceling the current fixed mechanism that uses 40% of the protocol's weekly revenue for token buyback and burning, and replacing it with flexible allocation of this part of the revenue to both reward users holding veLISTA and support DAO operations and ecosystem development. The allocation of the remaining 60% of revenue will remain unchanged.The ListaDao team stated that this action will effectively control inflation risks, release more funds to drive ecosystem development, and enhance market and community confidence in the protocol's long-term value. Once approved, the proposal will be immediately executed, and the relevant tokenom

item.title: Tether CEO: Bitcoin is Certainty
item.description: On August 11th, Paolo Ardoino, the CEO of Tether, stated that Bitcoin is all about determinism.According to Arkham data, Tether currently holds a total of 77,901 bitcoins, which are worth approximately $9.47 billion.Earlier on July 31st, Tether's financial report showed that the total holding of US Treasury bonds amounted to $127 billion. There were $105.5 billion held directly and $21.3 billion held indirectly. This was an increase of about $8 billion from the first quarter. The company achieved a net profit of $4.9 billion in the second quarter. In the first half of 2025, the total profit was $5.7 billion, including $3.1 billion in recurring profits.

item.title: Binance C2C launches $2000 T0 Withdrawal Limit
item.description: August 11th, Binance C2C declared that it will set a $2000 T0 (Instant) withdrawal limit for all users starting immediately. In order to further improve user experience, users who purchase less than $2000 worth of cryptocurrencies on the platform can avail themselves of instant withdrawals, which makes fund transfers more efficient and secure.

item.title: 「Hype Edition MicroStrategy」 HYPD Soars Over 17% in Pre-market Trading, Market Cap Rises to $41.8 Million
item.description: On August 11th, according to data from Rockflow, the US stock "HYPE Version MicroStrategy" HYPD saw a surge of over 17% in pre-market trading, and its market value rose to $41.8 million.

item.title: Three Whales Recently Accumulated Nearly $13.5 Million Worth of LINK
item.description: On August 11th, as monitored by lookonchain, whales are constantly accumulating LINK. In the past two days, Address 0x3c9E withdrew 510,000 LINK from Binance (approximately $11.13 million) and deposited it into Compound. Four hours ago, Address 0x42A1 spent $1.34 million to buy 59,560 LINK. Five hours ago, Address 0x848a spent $1 million to buy 44,846 LINK.

item.title: 「BNB Version of MicroStrategy」 BNC Soars Over 31% in Pre-market Trading, Market Cap Rises to $14.38 Million
item.description: On August 11th, based on Rockflow market data, the US stock "BNB Version MicroStrategy" BNC witnessed a surge of more than 31% in pre-market trading, and its market value rose to $14.38 million.Earlier on this day, BNC announced the purchase of 200,000 BNB with a total expenditure of approximately $160 million, becoming the world's largest enterprise-level BNB holder. CEA Industries (BNC) completed a $500 million private placement led by YZi Labs on August 5, 2025 to support its BNB-centric treasury strategy. The company, which previously traded under the symbol VAPE, changed its ticker to BNC on Wednesday, August 6, 2025.

item.title: Cryptocurrency Total Market Cap Surpasses $4.1 Trillion, with a 24-hour Change of 1.9%
item.description: On August 11th, according to CoinGecko data, the total market capitalization of cryptocurrencies has exceeded $4.1 trillion and is currently at $4.117 trillion, with a 24-hour growth rate of 1.9%. The 24-hour trading volume in the cryptocurrency market has reached $1457.073 billion.

item.title: Binance will resume the funding rate settlement frequency of MYXUSDT and OMNIUSDT to once every four hours.
item.description: On August 11th, Binance announced that commencing from August 11th, 2025, at 20:00 (UTC+8), the funding rate settlement frequency of the MYXUSDT and OMNIUSDT U perpetual contracts will be resumed to once every four hours.

item.title: Binance Alpha New Airdrop SLAY Claim Threshold: Phase 1 requires 227 points
item.description: August 11th. Binance Alpha will be the first to launch SatLayer (SLAY). And Alpha trading will commence on August 11th, 2025, at 10:00 (UTC). Qualified users can claim a 525 SLAY airdrop on the Alpha event page by using Binance Alpha points within 24 hours after the trading starts.The Binance Alpha airdrop will be distributed in two stages:Stage 1 (First 18 hours): Users who hold at least 227 Binance Alpha points can claim the airdrop.Stage 2 (Last 6 hours): Users holding at least 200 Binance Alpha points can participate in the airdrop on a first-come, first-served basis. If the rewards are not completely distributed, the points threshold will automatically decrease by 15 points per hour.
